The provided chunk is the header section of a Python module named `OnscreenImage`. This module defines a class `OnscreenImage` that inherits from `DirectObject` and `NodePath`, and is used to display images on screen in a Panda3D application. The chunk includes the module's docstring, which provides an overview of the module and references the official documentation for more details, as well as the necessary imports for implementing the class. This section sets up the basic structure and dependencies required for the rest of the module.
